snippet.title: Cold VR - Official Release Window Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: Watch the trailer for Cold VR, a VR bullet hell arena shooter developed by ALLWARE LLC. Players will utilize time to shoot through waves of enemies across an array of levels. Cold VR is launching in December 2024 for PlayStation VR2 (PS VR2), SteamVR, and Meta Quest.
